items.name: static var bit_CenterSurround: AudioChannelBitmap
items.desc: Center surround channel; or for WAVE (.wav) files, back center.

items.name: static var bit_LeftSurround: AudioChannelBitmap
items.desc: Left surround channel; or for WAVE (.wav) files, back left.

items.name: static var bit_LeftSurroundDirect: AudioChannelBitmap
items.desc: Left surround direct channel; or for WAVE (.wav) files, side left.

items.name: static var bit_RightSurround: AudioChannelBitmap
items.desc: RIght surround channel; or for WAVE (.wav) files, back right.

items.name: static var bit_RightSurroundDirect: AudioChannelBitmap
items.desc: Right surround direct channel; or for WAVE (.wav) files, side right.

items.name: static var bit_VerticalHeightCenter: AudioChannelBitmap
items.desc: Vertical height center channel; or for WAVE (.wav) files, top front center.

items.name: static var bit_VerticalHeightLeft: AudioChannelBitmap
items.desc: Vertical height left channel; or for WAVE (.wav) files, top front left.

items.name: static var bit_VerticalHeightRight: AudioChannelBitmap
items.desc: Vertical height right channel; or for WAVE (.wav) files, top front right.
